definitions.definition: A tool consisting of a rubber or similar blade attached at a right angle to a handle , particularly

subdefinitions.definition: A long - handled tool used on ships for swabbing the decks and spreading protective coatings .
Similar long - handled tools used for drying or leveling surfaces such as paths and roadways .
A short - handled tool , especially as used on car windshields and home windows .

definitions.definition: A roller used to similar effect , particularly

subdefinitions.definition: A tool used to remove excess moisture from a print .
A street - cleaning machine consisting of a roller made of squeegee blades pulled by a horse .
A tool used to force the ink through the stencil in silk-screen printing .

definitions.definition: A person who uses a squeegee, especially one who " cleans " the windshield of a car stopped at a traffic light and then demands payment .

main_definition: A tool consisting of a rubber or similar blade attached at a right angle to a handle , particularly
secondary_definitions: A roller used to similar effect , particularly
( slang ) A person who uses a squeegee, especially one who " cleans " the windshield of a car stopped at a traffic light and then demands payment .
